<SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow">
  <CreateMemoryTable x:Name="createTicketDetailsTable" activityLicenseType="1" id="291" name="CreateMemoryTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Create Memory Table" Description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" TableName="ticketDetails" ColumnNumber="2" RowNumber="3" TableAsString="<NewDataSet> <xs:schema id='NewDataSet' xmlns='' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:msdata='urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata'> <xs:element name='NewDataSet' msdata:IsDataSet='true' msdata:MainDataTable='resultSet' msdata:UseCurrentLocale='true'> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs='0' maxOccurs='unbounded'> <xs:element name='resultSet'> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name='ShortDescription' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /><xs:element name='Description' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <resultSet><ShortDescription>Web server is down</ShortDescription><Description>This is an example of a description. You can put any text in here that you'd like.</Description></resultSet> </NewDataSet>" isEmptyGrid="0" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" label="Create Memory Table" description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" notes="" />
  <GetRowsCount x:Name="ticketCount" activityLicenseType="1" id="287" name="GetRowsCount" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" Description="Counts the number of rows in a table" ResultSet="%ticketDetails%" TypeName="GetRowsCount" label="Get Rows Count" description="Counts the number of rows in a table" notes="" />
  <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="WhileActivity" notes="">
    <SequenceActivity x:Name="whileSequenceActivity1">
      <ExitWhile name="ExitWhile" Counter="%ticketCount%" exitWhileInsideWhile="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" isValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" whileSequenceActivity="whileSequenceActivity1" />
      <GetCellValue x:Name="ticketShortDescription" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%ticketDetails%" ResultSetName="ticketDetails" RowNumber="%whileActivity1%" ColumnType="Name" ColumnNumber="ShortDescription" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" notes="" />
      <GetCellValue x:Name="ticketDescription" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%ticketDetails%" ResultSetName="ticketDetails" RowNumber="%whileActivity1%" ColumnType="Name" ColumnNumber="Description" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" notes="" />
      <SNCreateRecord x:Name="snCreateTicket" activityLicenseType="1" id="243" name="SNCreateRecord" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:05:00" TimeInSeconds="300" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="SN Create Record" Description="Creates a new Service Now record" SelectedModuleID="12" SelectedModuleName="ServiceNow" FormId="bc2c432e-52db-4cde-90b7-31efdedd979b" FormName_UI="Incident(incident)" FormName="Incident(incident)" XMLTableResult="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Settings><Settings Category="request" /><Settings Impact="2" /><Settings Urgency="2" /><Settings Short___description="%ticketShortDescription%" /><Settings Description="%ticketDescription%" /></Settings>" SelectedModuleType="24" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" TypeName="SNCreateRecord" label="SN Create Record" description="Creates a new Service Now record" notes="" />
    </SequenceActivity>
  </WhileActivity>
</SequentialWorkflowActivity>
